column4: wow, people are still bashing microsoft with juvenile jokes in 2011.
i don't care for windows, thats all. i hate almost everything about it (other than the fact that it does run alot of games i can't play on Ubuntu)
i can't say i didn't like Unity, i just don't like the lack of customization available as of now
it's just another OS, some people like it.  I don't mind 7, it's actually not that bad.  I just don't like how resource heavy the OS itself is.
